name: Brandon Mack
text: Barley any steak in my Howie roll, but tons of cheese and doe. Exact same thing with my pepperoni Howie roll. I had to use napkins to dab the grease off both of them.  Boneless buffalo wings,  one word "soggy". That was my very first time eating from there.  Very disappointed.

name: Dorothy Long
text: Delicious

name: Dylan Lafferty
text: Tonight was the first and hopefully last time I‚Äôll ever be disappointed with Hungry Howies. I get Howies very often and it is always excellent. However tonight I placed a order at 6:30 & didn‚Äôt get my pizza delivered until 7:50, when I ‚Ä¶More

name: Alyse Luther
text: Love it! Just had it for the second time and it's SO good. My son really liked the ranch crust & well everything is spot on! Great prices and people as well.

name: Mystic Leaf
text: Some of the best pizza I had in awhile. First time trying it, and the flavored crust is so good. People who work there are really nice also. Will be eating here again.

name: Jacob Settle
text: Their baked subs are really good. I like the pizza crust for their pizza as well... Always a good choice if you wanna switch things up for a meal

name: william zack
text: Always kind ppl working there , The delivery drivers are great the food is always very good

name: Chris Weamer
text: Great pizza!! And everything else

name: Erin Lebo
text: Fist Time I ate there just happened to see the place next to where my kid had an appointment just a quick stop and it was amazing best pizza and breadsticks iv had in so long 5 stars +

name: Beth Sanders
text: Lots of choices great pizza

name: Lightning Zan
text: I'm a frequent customer, and they have always done a great job. The staff is friendly, the food is great, and the service is quick.

name: Tim Boggs
text: Ordered online and food came quick. But my turkey club had rotten lettuce on it. Not wilted or yellow. This was brown and slimey. Like it had fell under the fryer and sat for a week. Wish I had seen it before I ate half of the sub. I have ‚Ä¶More

name: Bevie Noel
text: Excellent pizza especially the parmesian stuffed crust

name: Daniel Giffin
text: Can't go wrong with good ol Howie's

name: Tammie Boston
text: Messed up my order,called right away and was told the Mgr was on a delivery and "MAYBE" we can work out a deal the next time I order. I tried to get in touch with the manager 5 times and he was always on a delivery! Finally got in touch and ‚Ä¶More

name: Ericw Barr
text: Too expensive for not good food

name: Tams
text: Fantastic food and amazing staff! Side note: no extra cheese needed b/c they make it extra cheesy already.  Highly recommend!

name: Ryan K
text: Arguably the best pizza chain in town. Exceptional food with a great owner and staff, and a unique flavored crust option to seal the deal! The pizza has lower amounts of sauce compared to other places, so if you like that then you will likely never find a better place.

name: Michelle Johnston
text: Omg papa johns meets lil Cesar‚Äôs w a hint of claysburg pizza.

name: Morganne Morrison
text: Never had a bad experience. My food is always ready when I arrive to pick up. Their Cajun style stuffed crust is to die for

name: Teddy Lados
text: They have decent food, esp when you're a on a budget. Fast and friendly service as well.

name: Geoffrey Palmieri
text: As good as they are in Michigan (where they have a million stores)

name: Lisa Hoover
text: Just LOVE the pizza and always friendly service. Their quick and can't beat the price.

name: Edward Rupp
text: Very good,

name: Sandra Diaz
text: Best Pizza in Altoona

name: Tara Ramos
text: I ABSOLUTELY LOOOOVE HUNGRY HOWIE'S CHEESY BREAD!! They also have many other great items in their menu and are very quick, courteous, and clean.

name: Bubba Pulcine
text: Never order again gave me 2 different prices never ever again

name: Tina Gorey
text: Just went here to get food...pull in and they turn off the lights after looking at us. Google said open until 10. Got there it was just before 9pm and they already had the register closed and counting money at the counter. :(

name: Wesley Gill
text: The staff is friendly and the pizza is great. There is no place to sit down and eat, but other than that this place is great.

name: Moreana R
text: Out of all the chains, Hungry Howie's is my favorite. The toppings are always fresh, the crust is delicious, its not overpriced, and delivery is always on time.

name: ShidWidley
text: Got a meatball sandwich that was clearly cooked earlier and reheated. The entire thing was like rubber but somehow blackened like it was charred? ‚Ä¶More

name: altoona reviews
text: I love hungry howies pizza. This is my favorite pizza shop in altoona. Their options are so awesome! Super unique! Very different from the other shops in altoona. The ranch crust pizza is definitely my favorite. I would recommend for everyone to come here and try out their pizza. You won‚Äôt regret it! It‚Äôs absolutely delicious.

name: Catherine Weyant
text: Amazing food and fast service..

name: Francis Yon
text: Love there wings, may be small but have a great taste.

name: John Miller
text: I wish there was prices on items so you know them before you ordered.

name: Keith Kensinger
text: Hungry Howie's Pizza must be one of those places where people either  love it or hate it.   Looking at the pizza before coming home I just knew I had to stop at the store and get some marinara sauce which turned out to be a great idea and much needed.  My first and last time there.

name: Dawn
text: Pretty tasteless crust on asiago bread and chicken bacon ranch sandwich dry and hard.

name: Jessica Adornetto
text: Great pizza, very reasonable price

name: kcomaty
text: Always stop here when passing through, great food, nice staff.

name: Spacky McGee
text: The food is tasty and at a good price. Try the pepperoni roll, I highly recommend it.

name: Marie Vaughn
text: Had great pizza from there and it tasted so yummy

name: Tim Summers
text: Great food,great service and fast !  Flavored crust is free !

name: Alysha Walker
text: Picked up an order got home and my calzone had hair in. Tried calling twice and no one would answer at 9:30 and they close at 10. Second call someone picked up and hang up on me. Awful customer service, very dissatisfied!

name: Nancy Carles Muir
text: My favorite pizza

name: Tommy Byrnes
text: Lover there food

name: Scott Schilling
text: Great pizza..decent prices

name: Justin Merrell
text: Yummy pizza, decent price. Clean facility, just no place to sit.

name: George Kochara
text: The wings were terrible won't order them again

name: Jess Aungst
text: Best pizza around

name: Mandy D.
text: Food was hot, fresh and good. Thank you

name: Wayne
text: Love the pizza and Howie bread

name: Zach Sebia
text: Don't plan on ordering after 8:30PM .This lazy staff won't bother answering their phone when it says they close at 10 PM. POS

name: Brian spahn
text: Good place for pizza

name: Tara Ramos
text: Hungry Howie's cheesy bread is 5 stars for sure and so is their üçï!

name: Dan Noel
text: Quick and easy

name: David Hanley
text: Great pizza

name: Brad Hendershot
text:
(Translated by Google) Delicious!

Delicioso!
